squidpony.squidgrid.shape

Class WangEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.shape.WangEdge

  • @Beta
public class WangEdge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent the edge (or corner) of a Wang Tile. All tiles need to have sizes that are multiples of the length in this class. The length itself is how much edge will be matched, so tiles larger than this will be broken into logical sub-edges for matching.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
